Reviews.Title: Great Camera Terrible Seller
Reviews.Author: Gary "Gary"
Reviews.Content: Love The Camera however the vendor in this case which is Focus Camera deserves a negative two stars. The camera is compact, takes great pictures and offers settings that really allow you to take extraordinary pictures in less then optimal situations, feels good to hold and is nicely weighted.Focus Camera on the other hand specializes in an about every attribute you can think of that is a reason for not buying from someone. Bad communication, shipped the wrong items in the order, failed to communicate in a reasonable amount of time after the problems came to light and then finally offered meaningless and irrelevant assistance after the fact. Avoid these people at all costs even if it costs a little more to do business with someone else.But as almost always, Amazon.com was there to save the day and provided the kind of Customer Service that you expect and took care of the issues quickly and competently.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kathy P.
Reviews.Content: We haven't had the camera long but very happy with its performance so far. Love the guide right on the screen for quick reference. Very good pictures and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Not all there
Reviews.Author: N P
Reviews.Content: The camera works great and takes nice pictures BUT.this is not the bundle you are looking for.  It only came with the case and SD card.  No accessories kit or lens cloth.Amazon did refund me 15% of the order to make up for the lack of bundle.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Vicki Orr
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and is easy to use.  Fits perfectly in the case.  Did not arrive with accessory kit but I was given a credit to purchase my own.

Reviews.Title: fall short of expectation
Reviews.Author: Shane L "there is no try"
Reviews.Content: Purchased camera based on the glowing review and the 20X zoom. However, I was very disappointed.1. the image quality was nowhere near as good as my 3 year old Nex 5 which only has 14MP  WX300 produced grainy image in-door well-lit with or without flash. without flash, it produces even worse image2. very slow saving files, it takes 2-3 seconds to save an image. tested with a class10 SD card came with kit, and a class10 SD i'm using with my nex5 camera. the results are the same, so I know it's not due to the SD card rating.skip this camera, spend a little extra for an exchangeable lens system. BTW,  the kit I received, did not come with the accessory kit or the cleaning cloth; only the SD and camera case.

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture breathtaking images, get close with 20x zoom.
Image stabilization reduces blur.<li>Crisp, beautiful HD videos.
Share instantly with built-in Wi-Fi.
Big-time battery life; Captures up to 500 photos on a single charge.
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX300/B 18.2 MP Digital Camera with 20x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (Black) + Sony 16GB SDHC Memory Card + Sony Camera Case + Accessory Kit
